name: Maho's Badge Server
description: A personal badge server for emitting badges for personal projects.

name: BadgeFed
description: The main server for emitting badges related to VocalCat and BadgeFed projects.

name: The Tech Baddie Studio
description: A badge server for The Tech Baddie Studio, a company that creates tech-related content.

name: Fediverse.Games
description: A badge server for the Fediverse Games Mastodon instance, supporting a friendly and inclusive community for all lovers of games, including board games, video games, and more.

name: FediCon Badge Server
description: The official badge server for FediCon (the Fediverse Conference in Canada).

name: Community Credentials
description: Empowering organizations with verifiable credentials to recognize achievements and contributions.

name: Fireside Fedi Badge Server
description: The official badge server for Fireside Fedi, a live podcast show where we sit down with folks from across the Fediverse to get to know them. A relaxing chill time, fully powered by Fediverse-connected tech. Let's stop yelling past each other and put the social back into social media.
